lead_paragraph: Albert Pujols, the St. Louis Cardinals’ first baseman, said he was upset he lost out to Philadelphia’s Ryan Howard for the National League’s Most Valuable Player award, saying yesterday the honor should go to a member of a playoff team. “Someone who doesn’t take his team to the playoffs doesn’t deserve to win the M.V.P.,” Pujols said in Spanish at a news conference in Santo Domingo.
